Body:
If I assume evolution of language took place over time, I am curious as to what can be the initial population of words or syllable or anything.

Lets say I am about to write a algorithm to evolve certain language. How do I start with it? What can the inital data set?
Title: Considering languages evolved over time, what could be the initial dataset?

LastEditedUser.AboutMe:
Travelling armchair linguist.

Never studied in an institution but read books and web with probably more breadth than depth.

Always on the road surviving in a strange foreign language, currently Mongolian and Mandarin Chinese.

And I collect dictionaries.
